content: Xingyu Pan is an undergraduate student of software engineering at Nanjing University. He joins the LAMDA group led by Prof. Zhi-Hua Zhou, under the guidance of Prof. Ming Li.
summary: Xingyu Pan is an undergraduate student of software engineering at Nanjing University. He joins the LAMDA group led by Prof. Zhi-Hua Zhou, under the guidance of Prof. Ming Li.
title: Xingyu Pan

content:
An Android App for reciting GRE words.
 It helps the customers manage words and scientifically makes a study plan according to The Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve.
 It is a coursework for Human-Computer Interaction Systems. And I completed the part of making the study plans.
summary: An Android App for reciting GRE words
title: WhaleWord
